pages.contacts: GameGear Rentals - Contact Us for Casino Equipment Rentals GameGear Rentals Home Services Contact Us Contact Us Have any questions or need assistance? Get in touch with us through the following contact details or fill out the form below. We're here to help you make your event a success! Contact Information Phone +1-905-364-1735 Email gamegearrentals@gmail.com Address 14 Finlay Mill Rd, Midhurst, ON L9X 0N7, Canada Get in Touch Name Email Message I accept the Privacy Policy Submit Frequently Asked Questions What is the minimum rental period? The minimum rental period for our casino equipment is one day. Do you provide delivery and setup services? Yes, we provide delivery and setup services for all our rentals to ensure your event runs smoothly. Can I customize my rental package? Absolutely! You can customize your rental package to fit your specific event needs. Contact us for more details. What are the payment options? We accept various payment options including credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. How do I book equipment for my event? You can book equipment by contacting us via phone or email. Alternatively, you can use our online booking form on the website. What happens if the equipment is damaged during my event? In the event of damage, you will be responsible for the cost of repairs or replacement. We recommend handling the equipment with care to avoid any issues. Are there any additional charges for locations outside the standard service area? Yes, additional charges may apply for locations outside our standard service area. Please contact us for a quote based on your location. Can I cancel my rental reservation? Cancellations are subject to our cancellation policy. Please review the terms at the time of booking or contact us for more information on cancellation procedures. What should I do if I have a problem with the equipment during the event? If you encounter any issues with the equipment during your event, please contact our support team immediately. We will provide assistance to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - GameGear Rentals GameGear Rentals Home Services Contact Us Privacy Policy At GameGear Rentals, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data and how we will treat it. 1. Information We Collect We may collect personal identification information from you in a variety of ways, including, but not limited to, when you visit our site, register on the site, place an order, fill out a form, and in connection with other activities, services, features, or resources we make available on our site. You may be asked for, as appropriate, name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and credit card information. We will collect personal identification information from you only if you voluntarily submit such information to us. 2. How We Use Collected Information GameGear Rentals may collect and use your personal information for the following purposes: To improve customer service To personalize user experience To process payments To send periodic emails To run promotions, contests, surveys, or other site features 3. How We Protect Your Information We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our site. 4. Data Retention We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. When determining the appropriate retention period for personal data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorized use or disclosure of your personal data, the purposes for which we process your personal data, and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, and the applicable legal requirements. 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website may use cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies to enhance your user experience. Cookies are small files placed on your device that help us recognize you and your preferences. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our site. 6. Children's Privacy We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from someone under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to delete that information. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. 7. Data Security Breaches In the event of a data security breach that affects your personal information, we will promptly notify you by email or through other means if we are required to do so by law. We will also take appropriate steps to investigate the breach and mitigate any potential harm to affected individuals. 8. User Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we hold. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us at gamegearrentals@gmail.com. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable data protection laws. 9. Data Transfers We may transfer your personal information to third parties located outside your jurisdiction for processing or storage. By using our services, you consent to such transfers. We will take appropriate measures to ensure that your data is protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws. 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website and updating the effective date at the top of this policy. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at gamegearrentals@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing any inquiries you may have and ensuring your privacy is protected. GameGear Rentals Services Contact us Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience. Learn more Got it!
pages.services: GameGear Rentals - Casino Equipment Rentals and Packages GameGear Rentals Home Services Contact Us Our Services Explore our extensive range of casino equipment available for rent, tailored to make your event unforgettable. From poker tables to roulette wheels, we provide high-quality equipment to suit any occasion. Detailed Equipment List Poker Tables Our poker tables are designed to provide a professional gaming experience. Each table includes high-quality felt, chip trays, and cup holders. Rental Price: $200 per day Blackjack Tables Our blackjack tables offer a sleek and professional appearance, complete with card shoes, discard trays, and chip trays. Rental Price: $180 per day Roulette Wheels Our authentic roulette wheels bring the excitement of a real casino to your event, complete with a felt betting layout and ball. Rental Price: $250 per day Craps Tables Our craps tables provide a full casino experience with a professional layout, dice, and chip trays. Rental Price: $300 per day Slot Machines Our slot machines offer a variety of games and themes to keep your guests entertained. Each machine is easy to set up and use. Rental Price: $150 per day Baccarat Tables Our baccarat tables come with a professional layout, card shoes, and chip trays, providing a high-stakes casino experience. Rental Price: $220 per day Casino Chips Our high-quality casino chips come in various denominations and are perfect for any gaming setup. Each set includes chips in different colors for easy denomination recognition. Rental Price: $50 per set per day Poker Chip Case Our poker chip cases are perfect for organizing and transporting your chips. Each case is sturdy and includes chips in various denominations. Rental Price: $75 per day Order Now Packages Choose from our pre-configured equipment packages designed to meet the needs of various events. Customize your package for the perfect event setup. Standard Package Includes 2 Poker Tables, 1 Blackjack Table, 1 Roulette Wheel. Price: $800 Premium Package Includes 3 Poker Tables, 2 Blackjack Tables, 1 Roulette Wheel, 1 Craps Table. Price: $1500 Ultimate Package Includes 4 Poker Tables, 3 Blackjack Tables, 2 Roulette Wheels, 2 Craps Tables. Price: $2500 Customize Your Package Booking Process 📖 1. Choose Your Equipment Browse our extensive range of casino equipment and select the items you need. 💰 2. Get a Quote Fill out our contact form with your requirements to receive a customized quote. 📅 3. Confirm Your Booking Once you approve the quote, confirm your booking and we'll take care of the rest. Delivery and Return We provide professional delivery and setup services to ensure your event runs smoothly. Our team will coordinate with you to deliver and set up the equipment at your chosen venue. After the event, we will promptly collect the equipment, ensuring a hassle-free experience for you. Please note that all rentals include delivery, setup, and collection services within the local area. For locations outside our standard service area, additional charges may apply. Contact us for more details and to discuss your specific requirements. We take pride in our punctuality and professionalism. Our delivery team is experienced and trained to handle all types of equipment, ensuring it arrives in perfect condition. Our return process is just as seamless. After your event, our team will dismantle and collect the equipment efficiently, allowing you to focus on enjoying the rest of your event. For events requiring extended rental periods, we offer flexible options to accommodate your needs. Just let us know your schedule, and we will make the necessary arrangements. Your satisfaction is our top priority. We are here to make your event planning process as smooth as possible, from the initial booking to the final return. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - GameGear Rentals GameGear Rentals Home Services Contact Us Terms and Conditions Welcome to GameGear Rentals. These Terms and Conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our website. 1. Acceptance of Terms By using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time, and your continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of any changes. 2. Use of Our Website You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only. You may not use the website to engage in any conduct that is illegal, fraudulent, or harmful to others. You agree not to interfere with or disrupt the operation of the website or its servers. 3. Equipment Rentals All rentals are subject to availability. We reserve the right to refuse service or cancel any order at our discretion. By placing an order, you agree to pay the rental fees specified at the time of booking. Additional charges may apply for damages, late returns, or special requests. 4. Payment Terms Payment for rentals must be made in full at the time of booking. We accept various payment methods, including credit/debit cards and other payment services. All payments are processed securely. Failure to pay the required amount may result in the cancellation of your reservation. 5. Delivery and Setup We will deliver and set up the equipment at the location specified by you. The delivery and setup fees are included in the rental price unless otherwise stated. You are responsible for providing accurate delivery information and ensuring that the location is accessible for our team. 6. Equipment Use and Care You are responsible for the care and proper use of the equipment during the rental period. Any damage or loss of equipment will result in additional charges. Please follow all instructions provided for the use and handling of the equipment. 7. Cancellation and Refund Policy Cancellation requests must be made at least 48 hours before the scheduled delivery time to receive a full refund. Cancellations made less than 48 hours in advance may incur a fee or be non-refundable. Refunds will be processed to the original payment method used at the time of booking. 8. Liability and Indemnity We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our equipment or services. You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of your use of our equipment and services. 9. Intellectual Property All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of GameGear Rentals or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from our website without our express written permission. 10. Governing Law These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which GameGear Rentals operates. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that jurisdiction. 11. Contact Information If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at gamegearrentals@gmail.com. We will make every effort to address your concerns and provide assistance as needed.
